import React, { useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; const AddOwner = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target); try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/add_owner", { method: "POST", body: formData, }); const data = await response.json(); setMessage(data.message); if (data.success) e.target.reset(); // reset form on success } catch (error) { console.error("Fetch error:", error); setMessage("Error submitting form!"); } }; return (
{message &&
{message}
}
); }; export default AddOwner;
